trans-unit.source: Represents a snapshot of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> instance that can be used to generate an archive.
A LogArchiveSnapshot object contains the information necessary to generate a consistent backup of the data in a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>.
The actual data is contained in the enumerable collection of <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion> objects returned by the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveRegions%2A> property.
Each <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion> instance represents a sequence of bytes in a file that must be archived.

The <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveTail%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.BaseSequenceNumber%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.LastSequenceNumber%2A> properties are for informational purposes only.
They can be recorded along with the archive data to provide optional information, but are not required to restore the data.
Gets an enumerable collection of <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref> instances containing the actual archival data.
An enumerable collection of <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref> instances containing the actual archival data.
Gets the sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> archive tail at the time the snapshot was taken.
The sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> archive tail at the time the snapshot was taken.
Gets the base sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
The base sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
Gets the last sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
The last sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
